data.message: It's getting really frustrating to read a post, or click on an article to read it and when I back out, so I can comment, I'm all the way back to the top of my news feed and the post/article is gone. It's REALLY annoying!

replies.message: Sorry to hear that, Shawnon. We're constantly working to improve our communities' experience with our products. Thank you for your feedback. If you have any additional suggestions you'd like to share, please visit: http://bit.ly/2gfjyhE. -Joe
Facebook Hi Joe. I've asked a question in this feed but I'm not getting a reply like these other users. Can you help me?
The same problem here. Click comment and it goes back to top of newsfeed. I can't believe this hasn't been fixed. What's the problem?
This bothers me too. Thank you

My friend is having problems with his page. He and I were in the middle of a conversation and all of a sudden his page was gone. I tried to get back on his page and it said contents not available. His name is Michael Taylor. Can you please check to see what the problem is. Thank you. Julia Williams
Facebook I am Julia Williams and I just wrote a request to you to repair my friend's page, Michael Taylor. Thank you
Yeah so much clickbait from all the pages I liked.

Same situation here, Facebook, could you please solve this problem too? Thanks & much appreciated.
Problem: auto jump to top of the post after viewing some post(it's annoying), or link.
Hi Facebook ! Can u please reactivate this account, fb.com/gadgetnihachiii it already submitted id's
G'.hkfoitvwr

Wow! Same problem here!
Does anyone else have any problems with uploading videos? Been happening for months here. I upload a video, notification drops on my phone that says."it's been uploaded" but it NEVER shows up on my page. 😠😠😠
We're sorry to hear that, Jessica. Please help our team track this issue by filling out this form: http://bit.ly/2fJBrrS. -Nick

sebepsiz yere hesaplarım kapanıyor yanlış bir davranışta veya ahlaksız payalşımlarda bulunmuyorum sahte hesap açmıyorum ama devamlıu hesapım kapatılıyor çevrede hesap kapatma koduyla hesap kapatanlar var lütfen yardım edin kimliğimi yolladım hala açılmadı.
شلونج يا غبصة
បងសីុងសំណប់
The problem I had has been fixed. Thanks!

Facebook Sorry, This Feature Isn't Available
Mohamed, thanks for coming to check out your memories. Currently, this feature isn't available to everyone.

I need help plz Facebook manager..
Hi Lica. This is a great place to ask questions. Let us know how we can help. -Joe
Facebook, why did y'all stop letting us put videos in picture albums ?
You help me
Omg I hate that too. Especially if you haven't been on all day and go really far down.
